titleStmt.title: A new tragicall comedie of Apius and Virginia wherein is liuely expressed a rare example of the vertue of chastitie, by Virginias constancy, in wishing rather to be slaine at her owne fathers handes, then to be deflowered of the wicked iudge Apius. By R.B. The players names. ...
Apius and Virginia
titleStmt.author: R. B.
Bower, Richard, d. 1561, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William How, for Richart Ihones,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
